name: Haiku Master
description:
This game was made for the My First Game Jam...Jam :)

Collect all 15 keys around the map to unlock your haiku.

Controls:
1. WASD- Movement

Tips:
1. Purple enemies explode a few seconds after being in close proximity to you. If you are within the red circle when this happens, you die.
2. Maroon enemies slow you down and steal a key when they touch you.
3. Enemies can go through walls...I apologize in advance.

Feel free to post the haiku you unlocked in the comments section :)

Tree assets by TJFREE
URL: https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:Clip_Art_Trees.svg
